productsCategories.categoryDescription: New to World of Warcraft? Start here.

products.heading: World of Warcraft®: Welcome to Azeroth Bundle
products.yellowText: Everything you need to begin your adventure, offer available through June 23!

productData.productName: World of Warcraft®: Welcome to Azeroth Bundle
productData.yellowText: Everything you need to begin your adventure, offer available through June 23!
descriptions: Take one small step into an adventure of a lifetime. With this limited-time value-packed offer, you get everything you need to begin your World of Warcraft journey today! Take to the skies in the critically acclaimed Dragonflight expansion, and prepare for a grand new adventure beginning August 26 at 3PM PDT with The War Within*.

Your Welcome to Azeroth bundle will include a Level 60 Character Boost and 60 Days of Game Time, so you can jump right into the Dragonflight content and discover the magic of Azeroth at your own pace.

productInfo.text: If you already have Dragonflight on your account, the expansion will not be re-granted.
Level 60 Character Boost not useable on World of Warcraft® Classic characters

data.heading: An Epic Adventure At Your Own Pace
data.description: Create a hero of the noble Alliance or the mighty Horde. New or returning defenders of Azeroth can explore Exile's Reach to unearth the fate of a lost expedition while mastering new skills, or immediately boost a character to level 60 to join the battle against ancient proto-dragons in Dragonflight.

data.heading: World of Warcraft®: Dragonflight
data.description: Spread your wings and dash into the latest World of Warcraft content with the included Dragonflight expansion and 60 Days Game Time. Discover daring quests and rise to new heights of power as you level up your character while exploring the magic and wonder of the Dragon Isles.

data.heading: The Next Grand Adventure
data.description: Explore Dragonflight and prepare for an epic three-expansion story arc beginning with The War Within*, launching August 26 at 3PM PDT. Learn more about the upcoming expansion and how to prepare for the next chapter of World of Warcraft.

data.heading: Processor
data.data: 4 Cores, 3.0 GHz processor (4th Generation Intel® Core™ Haswell or AMD Ryzen™ Zen)

data.heading: Video
data.data: DirectX® 12 capable 3 GB GPU (NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 900 series, AMD™ GCN 4th gen, or Intel® Iris® Xe Graphics)

data.heading: Processor
data.data: 6 Cores, 3.5 GHz processor (8th Generation Intel® Core™ Coffee Lake or AMD Ryzen™ Zen 2)

data.heading: Video
data.data: DirectX® 12 capable 8 GB GPU (NVIDIA® GeForce® RTX, AMD™ RDNA™ 2, or Intel® Arc™ 7 Graphics)

data.heading: Processor
data.data: 4 Cores, 2.9 GHz processor (6th Generation Intel® Core™ Skylake or Apple® M1)

data.heading: Video
data.data: Metal® capable 3 GB GPU (AMD™ GCN 4th gen or Apple® M1)

data.heading: Processor
data.data: 8 Cores, 3.6 GHz processor (6th Generation Intel® Core™ Skylake or Apple® M1)

data.heading: Video
data.data: Metal® capable 8 GB GPU (AMD™ GCN 4th gen or Apple® M1)

productDetails.heading: Product Requirements
requirements: Requires World of Warcraft®, Internet connection, Battle.net® Account, and Battle.net® desktop app to play.
Requires World of Warcraft® Subscription or Game Time
